title: Do you know some MYTHs or FALSE belief about landmines?
content:
UNICEF and DanChurdAid in coordination with government conducted a Knowledge, Attitude and Practice (KAP) survey in South-East of Myanmar and following are some of the Myths about landmines and ERW.

-	Burning was a safe way to get rid of mines
-	Following animals is a safe way to check of mines 
-	Prodding is a safe way to check for mines
-	Homemade mines have small battery and are not active after six months or 
-	After rainy season mine are deactivated
